version_description:
+ You can add a comment to event now.
+ A type's shortcuts can show individually.
+ Supports iPad/iPad Pro.
^ Other user experience improvement.

+ You can add a comment to event now.
+ A type's shortcuts can show individually.
+ Supports iPad/iPad Pro.
^ Other user experience improvement.

+ PIE CHART available!
+ Statistics for particular type or object
+ You can share Timeblocks with your friends
^ Improve object creating experience

+ PIE CHART available!
+ Statistics for particular type or object
+ You can share Timeblocks with your friends
^ Improve object creating experience

+ iCloud Backup，never lose data！
+ Added Japanese language
+ Switch language in app
+ Support custom fonts！
* Fixed crash when ending edit
^ Shortcut sorted by latin

+ iCloud Backup，never lose data！
+ Added Japanese language
+ Switch language in app
+ Support custom fonts！
* Fixed crash when ending edit
^ Shortcut sorted by latin
* Fixed the AppStore Icon is a pixel different from App's Icon
* Fixed the AppStore Icon is a pixel different from App's Icon

+ Color theme & Colorblind mode
+ Daily record reminder
+ Types can be 'Merged'
+ Unused types can be 'Archived'
+ A Blocks can be 'Copied'/'Pasted'
+ Check trend directly in statistics
+ Statistics of last 7, 30, 90 days
+ Trend

+ Color theme & Colorblind mode
+ Daily record reminder
+ Types can be 'Merged'
+ Unused types can be 'Archived'
+ A Blocks can be 'Copied'/'Pasted'
+ Check trend directly in statistics
+ Statistics of last 7, 30, 90 days
+ Trend

If you get some problems of using Timeblocks, try to send an email to me, because I can't contact you from your comment, it's impossible to help you. Thank you!

+ Adjustable track precision, support 15 minutes block
+ "View Mode" added for easie

If you get some problems of using Timeblocks, try to send an email to me, because I can't contact you from your comment, it's impossible to help you. Thank you!

+ Adjustable track precision, support 15 minutes block
+ "View Mode" added for easie

+ You can disable pixelated font now
+ Fix remind everyday text
^ Optimize sidebar speed

+ You can disable pixelated font now
+ Fix remind everyday text
^ Optimize sidebar speed

!!! Don't update if your device is iOS7 !!!

> Timeblocks has changed name to BlockyTime
+ Completely compatible with iOS 10
+ Pixelate can be turned off
+ Mark 'NOW' by tapping event without selecting
+ Launch animation can be turned

!!! Don't update if your device is iOS7 !!!

> Timeblocks has changed name to BlockyTime
+ Completely compatible with iOS 10
+ Pixelate can be turned off
+ Mark 'NOW' by tapping event without selecting
+ Launch animation can be turned

* Fixed the bug of 'Show Dividing Line between Days'
* Fixed some bugs of guider view
* Improve 3rd-party keyboard compatibility

* Fixed the bug of 'Show Dividing Line between Days'
* Fixed some bugs of guider view
* Improve 3rd-party keyboard compatibility

* Fixed the bug of Daylight Saving Time
* Improve 3rd-party keyboard compatibility again

* Fixed the bug of Daylight Saving Time
* Improve 3rd-party keyboard compatibility again

+ Tap Event Label directly to quickly mark latest time without blocks selected
+ Exported as CSV file
+ Password lock is added
* Fix the bug of pixel font invalidity
+ Settings could be initialized once
+ Korean is added in some UI
^ Mor

+ Tap Event Label directly to quickly mark latest time without blocks selected
+ Exported as CSV file
+ Password lock is added
* Fix the bug of pixel font invalidity
+ Settings could be initialized once
+ Korean is added in some UI
^ Mor

+ Event reminder added
+ NOW indicator added
+ Traditional Chinese(TW & HK) added
+ Default statistics duration can be set
* Fix bug of popping commend incorrectly when tracking quickly
^ No need to relaunch after change Pixelate or fon

+ Event reminder added
+ NOW indicator added
+ Traditional Chinese(TW & HK) added
+ Default statistics duration can be set
* Fix bug of popping commend incorrectly when tracking quickly
^ No need to relaunch after change Pixelate or fon

* Fix the bug of daylight saving time display
+ Not pop alert when add a future block every time
+ Landscape enabled on iPad (set it in Setting)
> Right slide the timeline to View-Mode
^ Adjust font size of Statistics and Trend
^ Optimi

* Fix the bug of daylight saving time display
+ Not pop alert when add a future block every time
+ Landscape enabled on iPad (set it in Setting)
> Right slide the timeline to View-Mode
^ Adjust font size of Statistics and Trend
^ Optimi

+ Add help page
+ Add Touch ID unlock
+ Shortcut can be top along with Event Object
+ Shortcut tag in main page can be edited by sliding left
+ Long press on date tag on the left of timeline to skip date
+ Show "yesterday, today, tomorrow"

+ Add help page
+ Add Touch ID unlock
+ Shortcut can be top along with Event Object
+ Shortcut tag in main page can be edited by sliding left
+ Long press on date tag on the left of timeline to skip date
+ Show "yesterday, today, tomorrow"

+ Add feature of Goal
+ Add feature of Email backup
* Help page content adjusts to system language automatically

Coming features forecast:

+ New feature of "Event Attribute"
+ Multiple blocks copy and paste
+ Circulate regular ev

+ Add feature of Goal
+ Add feature of Email backup
* Help page content adjusts to system language automatically

Coming features forecast:

+ New feature of "Event Attribute"
+ Multiple blocks copy and paste
+ Circulate regular ev

* Fix the bug of crash when use Buddhist calendar or Japanese calendar
* Fix the bug time in reminder can't be changed
+ Add back button and reset zoom button in Snapshot
^ More smooth to open drawer and pop a dialogue
^ Other improvement of u

* Fix the bug of crash when use Buddhist calendar or Japanese calendar
* Fix the bug time in reminder can't be changed
+ Add back button and reset zoom button in Snapshot
^ More smooth to open drawer and pop a dialogue
^ Other improvement of u

+ Adapt to iPhone X
+ Event Object can be target
+ Add icons to Setting for easily recognized
* Fix the bug of password invalid after relaunch
* Fix the bug of statistics default selected
* Fix the wrong location of scroll bar in list
*

+ Adapt to iPhone X
+ Event Object can be target
+ Add icons to Setting for easily recognized
* Fix the bug of password invalid after relaunch
* Fix the bug of statistics default selected
* Fix the wrong location of scroll bar in list
*

^ Optimized the speed of launch largely
+ A whole new look App icon without pixel (only support iOS 10.3 and above)
+ Set text on blocks freely in track mode
* Fix the display fault of scrolling by page
* Fix the display fault of scrolling sho

^ Optimized the speed of launch largely
+ A whole new look App icon without pixel (only support iOS 10.3 and above)
+ Set text on blocks freely in track mode
* Fix the display fault of scrolling by page
* Fix the display fault of scrolling sho

* Fix the bug of text disappearance on blocks
* Fix the bug of setting no-pixel icon on iPad

* Fix the bug of text disappearance on blocks
* Fix the bug of setting no-pixel icon on iPad
* Fixed the bug of Daylight saving time in the southern hemisphere
* Fixed the bug of Daylight saving time in the southern hemisphere

+ Add 9 original reminder rings
+ Ring's audition is available and can be set as default
+ 70 whole new colors and custom color added
+ Timeline can be distinguished between day and night
+ Hide Continuous Blocks' Text
* Fix the bug of calc

+ Add 9 original reminder rings
+ Ring's audition is available and can be set as default
+ 70 whole new colors and custom color added
+ Timeline can be distinguished between day and night
+ Hide Continuous Blocks' Text
* Fix the bug of calc
* Fixed the emergency bug of crash when use Face ID on iPhone X
* Fixed the emergency bug of crash when use Face ID on iPhone X

+ Able to import data from BlockyTime Lite
+ Undo the marked blocks by shaking in main page

+ Able to import data from BlockyTime Lite
+ Undo the marked blocks by shaking in main page

+ New feature: Stamper
Save some common used blocks as a stamper, just a tap on this stamper to mark as it!
> Move Expand/Contract all Shortcut to Event Label's Top
> Turn down the text font size on block
^ Some other user experience

+ New feature: Stamper
Save some common used blocks as a stamper, just a tap on this stamper to mark as it!
> Move Expand/Contract all Shortcut to Event Label's Top
> Turn down the text font size on block
^ Some other user experience

+ Adapt to iPhone XR & new all-screen iPad Pro
* Fix the bug of customize Event-Type colors on some devices
* Fix the bug of Stamper page's crash on some devices
> Change the launch page and some icons

+ Adapt to iPhone XR & new all-screen iPad Pro
* Fix the bug of customize Event-Type colors on some devices
* Fix the bug of Stamper page's crash on some devices
> Change the launch page and some icons

* Fix possible crash in Stamper
* Fix display error in iPhone XR

* Fix possible crash in Stamper

* Fix display error in Goal
> Change some icons

* Fix the bug of Color Blind Mode

+ Support multiple iCloud backup
+ Add System Haptics
+ Easy to skip the boot animation
* Fixed some small bugs

+ Support multiple iCloud backup
+ Add System Haptics
+ Easy to skip the boot animation

+ Dark mode added
+ More convenient to switch into View mode added
+ Custom color adjust slightly added
+ Long press title in navigation bar to open calendar added
+ Password find tips added
* Fix the bug of back to today of Standard time i

* Fix chart's bug in Trend
* Fix failure to enable Notifications after update from BlockyTime Lite
